oscar.name: thin-OSCAR
oscar.summary: OSCAR support for thin client (diskless, systemless, ...)
oscar.vendor: Centre de Calcul Scientifique, Sherbrooke University
oscar.description:
This package provide tools to manage thin clients.
It only support one kind of clients for the moment : diskless clients. We use the root ramdisk technique to load a minimal system build from an existing SIS image.
Previously we used rootNFS based clients but it is less scalable (saturation of NFS server).
Plan to support systemless (nodes with only temporary disk space, swap space and/or distributed file system for /home for instance).
